t:
I got a call from my daughter this morning.


Now I'm wondering,
whom did I push in front
of the train yesterday.
c:
Maybe just my wife, no one important.



#daughter #call #morning #train #push #murder #ghost #haunt





Reversed https://www.nytimes.com/2019/09/23/nyregion/subway-jump-dad-daughter.html, added ghost.
